attributes.action: Strip Meghan and Harry of their “Duke and Duchess of Sussex” titles.
attributes.additional_details: Their latest statement on the subject of service has sparked outrage amongst the public. The title was given to them at marriage on the basis that they would be working royals serving the monarchy. As this is no longer the case, this title cannot be used for personal financial gain. It therefore has no purpose and must be removed.
attributes.background: Take back the Dukedom of Sussex from Harry and Meghan
